forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Scattered thunderstorms. High 11C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Thunderstorms likely this morning. Then the chance of scattered thunderstorms this afternoon. High 54F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 7C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 46F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Showers and thunderstorms likely. High 52F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Thunder possible. Low 43F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
